text: Vegan Cauliflower rice with Takuwa, chocolate cheesecake and pandan loaf are MUST TRIES! Staff is so lovely and atmosphere super relaxing. One of the very few glutenfree spots in town that I can heartly recommend :-)

My favourite place to eat in Singapore. Healthy delicious food, great options for people on keto or low carb, very reasonably priced, lots of vegan options, friendly family place run with love at the botanical gardens. What's not to like?

A Deliciously Dairy-Free and Gluten-Free Delight!

I recently dined at Nourish Table, and I was thoroughly impressed! Nourish Table,  completely exceeded my expectations.  The menu exciting, offering creative and flavorful dishes that were both dairy-free and gluten-free.  The ingredients were clearly fresh and high-quality.  The service was friendly and the atmosphere was warm and inviting.  I highly recommend Nourish Table to anyone looking for a delicious and healthy meal, regardless of dietary needs.  Five stars!

I had the cauliflower vegan bowl and it taste great! Love the pesto that's freshly made by the chef. (I finished all in the plate, including the pesto)

Tried vegan chocolate ball and it is rich with authentic ingredients! I can't help to finished it by my own even I'm on diet..

(No white sugar is used, they use maple syrup, raw honey)

Situated within the iconic Botanical Gardens is this hidden gem serving healthy yet delicious food for the soul. Ingredients were fresh, colourful but most importantly yummy. Some pretty unique dishes that cater to a variety of diets. Will definitely be back to try more of their vegan and gluten free options!!
